{% set code_dir = "${PWD}" %}

{%- for egg in project.eggs -%}
{% set name = egg.name %}
{% set repo = egg.repo %}
{% set subdir = "" %}
{% if egg.get("subdir", None ) %}
{% set subdir = "&subdirectory=%s" | format(egg.subdir) %}
{% endif %}

-e file://{{ code_dir }}/{{ egg.repo }}#egg={{ egg.name }}{{ subdir }}

{%- endfor -%}
